text:
Sergei Yurievich Yursky (, 16 March 1935 – 8 February 2019) was a Soviet-born Russian actor, theatre director and screenwriter. His best known works were "The Little Golden Calf", "Time, Forward!" and "The Meeting Place Cannot Be Changed". He was born in Leningrad, Soviet Union.
Yursky died on 8 February 2019 from cardiac arrest in Moscow, aged 83.

annotations.surface_form: The Meeting Place Cannot Be Changed
